mapper.select: select id, title, description, photo_url photoUrl, content, author, visit_count visitCount, create_time createTime from ft_news where is_delete = 0 order by id limit 6
select id, title, description, photo_url photoUrl, content, author, visit_count visitCount, create_time createTime from ft_news where id = #{id}
select id, title, description, photo_url photoUrl, content, author, visit_count visitCount, create_time createTime from ft_news where id < #{id} order by id desc limit 1
select id, title, description, photo_url photoUrl, content, author, visit_count visitCount, create_time createTime from ft_news where id > #{id} order by id limit 1
mapper.update: update ft_news set visit_count = visit_count+1 where id = #{id}
